text: Ali A. Zaidi (born 1987/1988) is a Pakistani-American lawyer and politician who is the 2nd White House National Climate Advisor since 2022. He was the first White House Deputy National Climate Advisor. He was the New York deputy secretary for energy and environment. In September 2022, President Joe Biden announced that Zaidi would replace Gina McCarthy as White House National Climate Advisor. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani lawyers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ali Zaidi (lawyer)
